actions.text: Hearings Held by Subcommittee on Oceanography Prior to Introduction and Referral (Mar 5, 81).
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.  Report No: 97-51.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out the National Advisory Committee on Oceans and Atmosphere Act of 1977 during fiscal years 1982, 1983, and 1984, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 97-51) Amends the National Advisory Committee on Oceans and Atmosphere Act of 1977 to authorize up to $650,000 for fiscal year 1982 and necessary sums for fiscal years 1983-1984. Revises provisions concerning tenure of replacement appointees to the National Advisory Committee on Oceans and Atmosphere.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out the National Advisory Committee on Oceans and Atmosphere Act of 1977 during fiscal years 1982, 1983, and 1984, and for other purposes.
